title: WTB: LONG Shot in the Dark Request :)
author: DeadBallEraCubs

posts.post_title: WTB: LONG Shot in the Dark Request :)
posts.post_content:
Back in 2009 I sold a Matty McIntyre (Portrait) on eBay. It was an SGC 40 I believe and was from the Lionel Carter Collection. I no longer have scans of it as my computer crashed a couple of years ago and I lost all of my old scans,etc. 

It would mean alot to me if I could purchase it back. I will pay handsomely to do so. It has more sentimental value to me then anything else. Figured I would try here and see if it turns up anything!!

Please email me at [url]TwirlerReulbach@sbcglobal.net[/url] if you can help.

Mike aka "freakhappy" I was able to locate the scans I had in my eBay listing. Now if only I can find the card :)




[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/royalrooterlxx/forsale/large/matty.jpeg[/IMG]
Why not just buy another one? Matty's rosy cheeks, pretty hairdo and soft pink background can be found quite easily.

I know the Matty portrait is easy but this particular card was the last T206 that I held on to when I sold off my collection in 2009. It had the Lionel Carter pedigree and I would very much love to have it back.

I have located the person whom purchased the card back in 2010. Thanks to all those that responded. We shall see if I can land it :)

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-N900A using Tapatalk

Well, good luck. I guess I'd miss my little Matty if he ever left the display in my beloved tobacco card room. 

:o <--- Matty-inspired smiley, all pink and pretty.
